Combat
Hit Points: 32 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 16 (strength; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to make a melee Strike on foe that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Power Attack: May use 2 actions for a melee Strike that inflicts 1 extra dice damage and counts as two Strikes for multiple attack penalty
Shield Block: May use a Reaction when shield is raised to negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Snagging Strike: May make a Strike that inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd if successful
Save: Fortitude: +8 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
